Uses of Class
jfx.incubator.scene.control.input.KeyBinding.Builder

Packages that use KeyBinding.Builder
Package
Description
jfx.incubator.scene.control.input
Incubates a customization mechanism for the JavaFX Controls utilizing the InputMap.

  • Uses of KeyBinding.Builder in jfx.incubator.scene.control.input

    Methods in jfx.incubator.scene.control.input that return KeyBinding.Builder
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    KeyBinding.Builder
    KeyBinding.Builder.alt()
    Sets the alt key down condition (the option key on macOS).
    static KeyBinding.Builder
    KeyBinding.builder(String character)
    Creates a KeyBinding.Builder with the specified character.
    static KeyBinding.Builder
    KeyBinding.builder(KeyCode code)
    Creates a KeyBinding.Builder with the specified KeyCode.
    KeyBinding.Builder
    KeyBinding.Builder.command()
    Sets the command key down condition on macOS.
    KeyBinding.Builder
    KeyBinding.Builder.control()
    Sets the control key down condition.
    KeyBinding.Builder
    KeyBinding.Builder.keyReleased()
    Sets the KEY_RELEASED condition, clearing KEY_PRESSED and KEY_TYPED.
    KeyBinding.Builder
    KeyBinding.Builder.keyTyped()
    Sets the KEY_TYPED condition, clearing KEY_PRESSED and KEY_RELEASED.
    KeyBinding.Builder
    KeyBinding.Builder.meta()
    Sets the meta key down condition.
    KeyBinding.Builder
    KeyBinding.Builder.option()
    Sets the option key down condition on macOS.
    KeyBinding.Builder
    KeyBinding.Builder.shift()
    Sets the shift key down condition.
    KeyBinding.Builder
    KeyBinding.Builder.shortcut()
    Sets the shortcut key down condition.
